title: Ranked disabled?
body:
Is ranked currently disabled? I know the servers are experiencing issues, but have not seen anything about ranked being taken down - the option to queue for a ranked match has just vanished from my client.

If yes, do we have an ETA? It's Friday night and I have no life rito.

replies.body:
Aaand it's back.
In other news I just queued for a ranked match - game spazzed out (Current server issues), copped a 3 LP penalty and 5m30s  before I can queue again >_>
